1.title: Korean Plastic Surgery
1.plot: In this video, we visited a plastic surgery clinic in Gangnam to see how they could fix our faces. Plastic surgery is a huge industry in Korea, and not just for the native population. Thousands of overseas travelers visit Korea to get plastic surgery, which is called \"Medical Tourism.

2.title: Male Makeup Tutorial
2.plot: In this video, we will show you how we get ready and do makeup for men.

3.title: Ultimate Korean Snacks Taste Test
3.plot: In this video, we will be reviewing many different Ultimate Korean Snacks,

4.title: Ultimate Korean Street Food Taste Test
4.plot: In this video, we will be reviewing many different Ultimate Korean Street Foods.

5.title: Korean Convenience Store Gourmet Food Challenge
5.plot: In this video, we will try to put together a three-course meal using only products from a local Korean convenience store.

6.title: Laser Teeth Whitening & Home Kits
6.plot: This is a first in a long series of dental, cosmetic and plastic surgery videos. In these videos, you will see everything from the initial consultation, the treatment and recovery. In this episode, Tony takes us to get our teeth whitened. BapMokja gets laser whitening and Haeppy gets a custom home kit. You will see the results at the end of the video.

7.title: Three Awesome Rentals in Korea
7.plot: Hi guys. We rent some cool modes of transportation in Hongdae, Seoul and at Gapyeong (near Nami Island). If you have any questions about this video, please leave a comment below.

8.title: Taiwanese Snacks Taste Test
8.plot: Hi guys. Today, we try Taiwanese snacks with our good friend Yerin. Please enjoy this video.

9.title: SMILE Laser Eye Surgery
9.plot: This is the second in a long series of dental, cosmetic and plastic surgery videos. In these videos, you will see everything from the initial consultation, the treatment and recovery. In this episode, Tony takes Dave to get SMILE Laser Eye Surgery.

10.title: 10 Delicious Indonesian Foods You Can't Pronounce Feat. No-Makeup SunnyDahye
10.plot: We eat some Indonesian food with SunnyDahye. Check out all of your favorite Indonesian foods here.

11.title: My Perfect South Korean Lasik Surgery Fully Exposed
11.plot: The third in a long series of dental, cosmetic, and plastic surgery videos. In these videos, you will see everything from the initial consultation, the treatment and recovery. In this episode, Tony takes Haeppy to get LASIK Laser Eye Surgery.

12.title: Incredible Contact Lens in Your Eye Surgery
12.plot: The fourth in a long series of dental, cosmetic, and plastic surgery videos!\nIn these videos, you will see everything from the initial consultation, the treatment and recovery. In this episode, Tony takes Haeppy to get ICL Corrective Eye Surgery.

13.title: Ultimate Indonesian Snacks Taste Test (Ft. SUNNYDAHYE)
13.plot: Hello, we are BapMokja and Haeppy. We try Indonesian snacks with our good friend SunnyDahye.

14.title: How to Use Incheon International Airport
14.plot: Hello, everyone. This is Bapmokja and Haeppy~. We took a short trip to Bali for work, so on our return, we thought we'd show you what to expect at Incheon International Airport in South Korea.

15.title: Getting Fabulous K-Pop Hair
15.plot: Hey, guys. We are BapMokja and Haeppy. We try authentic Thai snacks with Thai superstar and entertainer Bie The Ska.

16.title: Ultimate Thai Snacks Taste Test Part 1 (Feat. Bie the Ska)
16.plot: Hey, guys. We are BapMokja and Haeppy. We try authentic Thai snacks with Thai superstar and entertainer Bie The Ska.

17.title: Ultimate Thai Snacks Taste Test Part 2 (Feat. VRZO's Pleum)
17.plot: Hey, guys. We are BapMokja and Haeppy. We try authentic Thai snacks with Thai superstar and entertainer Pleum.

18.title: Playing Pokémon GO In Korea
18.plot: Hey, guys. We are BapMokja and Haeppy. We did Pokémon GO in Sokcho, South Korea. See what we caught!. Enjoy.

19.title: Learning Basic Taekwondo
19.plot: How do you become a taekwondo master? Years of training. But how do you know it's for you? How about a one-day experience course. We visited the International Kumgang Taekwondo Centre in Seoul to learn from the master himself, Master Ryan.

20.title: Shooting Guns with a Sexy Korean Actress
20.plot: We go shooting with Korean actress Leah Kim (SNL, TouchQ). Check out our first time shooting pistols at Korea Shooting Club right in the center of Myeongdong.

21.title: Korean Archery with a Sexy Korean Actress
21.plot: We try some Traditional Korean Archery with Korean actress Leah Kim (SNL, TouchQ). We visited the Nanji National Archery Center by the Han River.

22.title: Get Ready with Haeppy: Asian Male Makeup Tutorial
22.plot: Get ready with Haeppy. Today, Haeppy shows you how he gets ready for his day with an easy-to-follow Asian male makeup tutorial.

23.title: Get Ready with BapMokja: White Male Makeup Tutorial
23.plot: Get ready with BapMokja. Today, we show you how BapMokja gets ready for his day and how he applies his male makeup.

24.title: 10 Reasons Why You Should Not Come to Korea
24.plot: Hello, everyone. We are BapMokja and Haeppy!\nOn this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we cover 10 reasons why you should *NOT* come to Korea (the best country in the world)

25.title: 10 Reasons Why You Should Come to Korea
25.plot: On this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we give you 10 reasons why you should come to Korea (the best country in the world).

26.title: 5 Best Things About Teaching in Korea
26.plot: IN THE PAST, we've been teachers in Korea, in EPIK. (We are NOT teaching now (look at my hair, (hahahahaha, no chance). We share with you the five BEST things about TEACHING in KOREA (in our opinion). Were you a teacher in Korea or somewhere else? Let us know what you thought the best things were and any heartwarming stories.

27.title: 5 Worst Things About Teaching in Korea
27.plot: IN THE PAST, we've been teachers in Korea, in EPIK. We are NOT teaching now (look at my hair, hahahahaha, no chance). We share with you the five WORST things about TEACHING in KOREA (in our opinion). Were you a teacher in Korea or somewhere else? Let us know what you thought the worst things were and any horrifying stories.

28.title: 5 Things You Must Do at a Korean Sauna
28.plot: On this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we show you five things you must do at a Korean sauna.

29.title: Top 5 Favorite Korean Foods!
29.plot: On this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we talk about our Top 5 Favorite Korean Foods.

30.title: Fruit-Flavored Soju Taste Challenge
30.plot: On this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we try to tell the difference among nine different soju flavors.

31.title: 50 Questions with Haeppy
31.plot: BapMokja's Q&A is coming soon. For now, enjoy these 50 Questions With Haeppy.

32.title: Ultimate Korean Street Food Taste Test: Busan Edition
32.plot: We try Korean Street Food in Busan.

33.title: Top 10 Worst Types of Teachers
33.plot: This is our list of the TOP 10 TYPES OF PEOPLE WHO SHOULDN'T BE TEACHERS. Remind you of anyone? Share it with them? Please watch our \"closing thoughts: section before getting offended. Note: We are not Korean. We are not current ESL teachers. But we were ESL teachers in the past, and we've seen many bad teachers come and go, and some who are still here. Although our word is not the law, just keep in mind the gravity of your decision to teach in another country. These are other people's lives and education. Don't take it lightly.

34.title: How to Apply for Teaching Jobs in Korea
34.plot: We visit the recruiting company Korvia to find out how to apply for teaching jobs in Korea. **This is not a sponsored video, but Korvia helped BapMokja when he came to Korea as a teacher.

35.title: Running on a Rush-Hour Subway in Korea
35.plot: In this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we see how fast we can navigate a subway train in Seoul.

36.title: Using a Wheelchair in Korea
36.plot: In this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we see how wheelchair-accessible Seoul is. Please share if you think it will help someone in their decision to visit Korea. HUGE thanks to Joel for being our cameraman for the day.

37.title: Jinju Lantern Festival #KREATOR2016
37.plot: We visited Jinju Lantern Festival with ChoNunMigookSaram, SunnyDahye and LatinaSaram for #Kreator2016.

38.title: Asian Cross-Dresses for Korean Halloween (Ft. KennyBoySlay)
38.plot: Hello, we're BapMokja and Haeppy. Today, we'll be showing you what we did on Halloween. *** Contains strong language ***

39.title: How People Feel About Trump Winning: Street Interviews
39.plot: We tried asking more people, but SO MANY didn't want to be on camera. Here are people who were fine sharing their opinions about the 2016 U.S. Presidential Election.

40.title: Costco in Korea
40.plot: Hello, we're BapMokja and Haeppy. We go on a trip to Costco to buy something special. But what is Costco in Korea like? Is it different from the stores in the USA/Canada?"

41.title: 1.2kg-Tiramisu Speed-Eating Challenge
41.plot: After our trip to Costco, we attempt to eat as much of this tiramisu cake in 1 minute.

42.title: 50 Questions with BapMokja
42.plot: Finally, here we are with BapMokja's 50 Q&A.

43.title: What Foreigners Think About Korea
43.plot: We asked young foreigners what they and their countries think about Korea. Huge thanks to SolBridge International Business School in Daejeon for allowing us to come and film their students. And SPECIAL thanks to ALL the students who participated in this video.

44.title: What Foreigners Think About Dating in Korea
44.plot: We asked young foreigners what they and their countries think about dating in Korea. Huge thanks to SolBridge International Business School in Daejeon for allowing us to come and film their students. And SPECIAL thanks to ALL the students who participated in this video.

45.title: 10 Places You Must Visit in Daejeon
45.plot: We show you 10 places you MUST visit in Daejeon, South Korea.

46.title: Korean University Tour: Solbridge International School BapMokja and Haeppy
46.plot: Where you you like us to visit next?. Leave us a comment below!\nFor more information about SolBridge.

47.plot: Watch this fun video about having a Christmas feast at a Korean convenience store with our special guest Amber.

48.title: Korean Convenience Store Christmas Feast Part 2 (Feat. Amber)
48.plot: Check out Part 2 of our fun Korean Convenience Store Christmas Feast, featuring rapper Amber.

49.title: How Many Optical Illusions Have You Seen?
49.plot: We all see things differently, so we took a look at some optical illusions. What do you see?

50.plot:

51.title: Getting K-Pop Hair
51.plot: We see some life-size illusions and play some fun games at Trick Eye Museum in Hongdae.

52.title: K-Pop Makeup Challenge
52.plot: Our friend BaeBae helps us out with some K-pop makeup.

53.title: Funny Puns in Biggest IKEA in the World
53.plot: We go to the IKEA in Korea with a REAL-LIFE SWEDE, learn some Swedish words and make some puns.

54.title: Swedish Food in IKEA in Korea
54.plot: We go to IKEA in Korea with a REAL-LIFE SWEDE, try the food and see how authentic it is.

55.title: Adorable Korean Pet Cafés
55.plot: On this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" BapMokja and Haeppy visit dog and cat cafés in Seoul to get some love. If you've ever wondered what a puppy café or a kitty café is like, you're in for a treat.

56.title: Unique Animal Cafés in Korea Sheep, Raccoons & Reptiles?!
56.plot: Join BapMokja and Haeppy on their adventure at unique pet cafés in Seoul, South Korea.

57.title: How to Get a Korean Driver's License in 1 Day!
57.plot: We go get DRIVING LICENSES and then explain step-by-step how to get one for yourself. We did find the process confusing at times and wish there had been a video to explain what to do, so we made one for everyone else so you don't have to struggle.

58.title: How to Buy a Car in Korea
58.plot: If you watched our last episode, we got our driver's licenses. In this episode, we explain how to buy a used car in Korea.

59.title: SNSD's Hyoyeon Delicious Sushi Roll Tutorial: How to Make Sushi Rolls
59.plot: If you come to Itaewon, Seoul visit NORI TABLE. You can order the rolls we made as part of a \"Secret Menu\"

60.title: How to Take the Subway and Buses in Seoul
60.plot: Welcome to the Korea Survival Guide With BapMokja and Haeppy. This video is all about how to take the Seoul public transportation system.

61.title: Funniest Photoshop 'Race Swap' Challenge
61.plot: We had fun and did a \"Race Swap\" Photoshop Challenge. What do you think? Who did a better job? Let us know.

62.title: Something New (Vlog)
62.plot: We prepared a vlog today. Hope you enjoy it.

63.title: The Best Market in Seoul
63.plot: Marko's name is Marko not Marco. Sorry, bro. Lol. Today, we visit the best market in Seoul. Come with us.

64.title: Cutest Cafe Worker Ever?
64.plot: Who's #cuter? The guy or the girl?

65.title: Megan (ChoNunMigookSaram) Skin Bleaching?!
65.plot: We visited our friend Megan's house.

66.title: Why We Changed Our Name
66.plot: Find out what our new name is.

67.title: Being a Vegan in Korea for 1 Day Challenge
67.plot: In this episode of \"twoplustwo,\" we go vegan for a whole day.

68.title: How to See a Doctor in Korea
68.plot: Welcome to the Korea Survival Guide with BapMokja and Haeppy. How to See a Doctor in Korea For an ambulance, call 119. For an emergency medical information center, call 1339 to speak to an English-speaking doctor. Available 24/7.

69.title: How to Rent in Korea
69.plot: Welcome to the Korea Survival Guide with BapMokja and Haeppy. Houses, apartments, three rooms, two rooms, one room, officetels, house shares and goshiwons. What are the different types of housing and which types are available for rent? What is key money?

70.title: Don't Get Fined! How to Throw Away Trash in Korea
70.plot: Welcome to the Korea Survival Guide with BapMokja and Haeppy. How do you dispose of your trash or rubbish? Recycling is SUPER important in Korea. If you break the rules, you can be fined.

71.title: How to Pay Your Bills in Korea

72.title: How to Get a Smartphone & Portable Wi-Fi in Korea
72.plot: Welcome to the Korea Survival Guide with BapMokja and Haeppy. How do you get a cell phone in Korea?

73.title: Impulse Buy, Unboxing & Try: Kangaroo Stilts
73.plot: Got some jumping stilt shoes - don't even know why. Here's our first try with them. Where you can buy Kangaroo Stilts.

74.title: The Greatest Impulse Buy Ever: Kangaroo Stilts Challenge
74.plot: After a week of available practice time, this is the best we could do.

75.title: Can You Eat More Meat Than Us? All You Can Eat Korean BBQ
75.plot: On this episode \"twoplustwo,\" we see if \"All You Can Eat\" is cost effective.

76.title: Harry Potter Jelly Beans Challenge
76.plot: In this episode, we eat the most disgusting jelly beans known to man.

77.title: K-Pop Challenge with the Vagabrothers!
77.plot: We play a K-pop humming/singing guessing game with the Vagabrothers who have NEVER heard a K-pop song (besides \"Gangnam Style\") before. How did they do? Leave YOUR favorite 10 songs you'd introduce to someone wanting to listen to K-pop.

78.title: British Guy Reacts to Chinese Dim Sum (Feat. Mira's Garden)
78.plot: We have the Ultimate Dim Sum experience in Hong Kong as we try (almost) EVERYTHING on the menu at the Old Fung Tea House.

81.title: Worst Day in Hong Kong Until ...
81.plot: We head on the Hong Kong MTR to Lantau Island and Tai O fishing village you get some footage and enjoy some seafood. Order your We Fancy Hat.

82.title: Where to Buy Shoes in Hong Kong
82.plot: We eat some more food at Tai O fishing village, go to buy shoes on Sneaker Street in Mong Kok, grab some hookah at Boba Bear, and play Hong Kong Style Beer Pong in Causeway Bay. Zerve+: Bigfoot Centre, 9/F, Zing, 38 Yiu Wa St, Bowrington, Hong Kong Order your We Fancy Hat.

83.title: He Met His DREAM GIRL Because of Me
83.plot: We got tattoos at Chiu Tattoos in Mong Kok. Order your We Fancy Hat.

84.title: Top 5 Crazy Chinese Foods That Will Surprise You (Feat. Smiling Boris)
84.plot: We try some DISGUSTING food in Hong Kong. Could you eat these Top 5 Crazy Chinese Foods? Order your We Fancy Hat.

85.title: Have You Tried This Terrible Drink? Feat. Smiling Boris
85.plot: We try some Chinese Medicine drinks and play the No Reaction Challenge. Is this the WORST DRINK in the WORLD? Order your We Fancy Hat.

86.title: 3 Chinese Foods You Probably Haven't Tried (Feat. Smiling Boris)
86.plot: We try Frog Legs, Snake Soup and Turtle Soup. It's Xander's first time. Will he like them? Order your We Fancy Hat.

87.title: Ultimate Hong Kong Street Food: Mong Kok
87.plot: We try all the best street foods available in the Mong Kok area of Hong Kong. Haeppy teaches us the names of the items and how to order in Cantonese. Order your We Fancy Hat.

88.title: Have You Tried These 11 Hong Kong Desserts?
88.plot: We try some awesome desserts in Hong Kong. Which ones do you wanna try? Order your We Fancy Hat.

89.title: Have You Eaten These 3 Hong Kong Breakfasts?
89.plot: We have three different types of Hong Kong breakfasts. Which ones have you tried? Order your We Fancy Hat.

90.title: Hong Kong Convenience Store FAIL!
90.plot: This is our last vlog from Hong Kong. Order your We Fancy Hat.

91.title: Korean Food Trends: Japanese Cotton Cheesecake and Squid Ink Chocolate Ice Cream
91.plot: We go to the Hongdae area of Seoul, South Korea, to try a popular food trend: the Devil and Angel cones from Kumo Cheese. Order your We Fancy Hat.

92.title: Spicy Korean Chicken and Cheese Like a Boss
92.plot: We have spicy Korean Chicken and Cheese, otherwise known as Cheese Chicken Galbi. Order your We Fancy Hat.

93.title: Korean Army Stew & How to Order It
93.plot: In this video, we show you how to order Korean Army Stew, otherwise known as . Order your We Fancy Hat.

94.title: Does Western Food in Korea Suck? - Seoga & Cook
94.plot: Let's see if Western food in Korea is good or not. Order your We Fancy Hat.

95.title: 55cm Raw Korean Beef Sushi
95.plot: We take on the 55cm Raw Korean Beef Sushi at GoYoNam in Hongdae with our friend KpopSteve. Purchase the We Fancy Merchandise.

96.title: Must-Try Best Korean Summer Dessert
96.plot: We eat some fruity Korean shaved ice, also known as Bingsu, with KpopSteve. Order the We Fancy Hat.

97.plot: We give you five ways Korea has changed us. Purchase your We Fancy Merchandise.

98.title: Korean Oven-Baked Chicken in Oppa Dak
98.plot: We go to the Hongdae area of Seoul, South Korea, to try a popular food trend: the Devil and Angel cones from Kumo Cheese. Order your We Fancy Hat.

imdb.plot outline: Welcome to korea and to BapMokja and Haeppy. We are going to show you the hottest/interesting K-trends with our show called "twoplustwo," a variety show of challenges, reviews, games and discussions. Hope you enjoy our videos, and if there's anything you want to know, please leave a comment and let us know.
imdb.title: Bapmokja and Haeppy
plot: Welcome to korea and to BapMokja and Haeppy. We are going to show you the hottest/interesting K-trends with our show called "twoplustwo," a variety show of challenges, reviews, games and discussions. Hope you enjoy our videos, and if there's anything you want to know, please leave a comment and let us know.
